price: Kuma aka ce wa waɗanda suka yi taƙawa, "Mẽne ne Ubangijinku Ya saukar?" Suka ce, "Alhẽri Ya saukar, ga waɗanda suka kyautata a cikin wannan dũniya akwai wani abu mai kyau, kuma haƙĩƙa, Lãhira ce mafi alhẽri." Kuma haƙĩƙa, mãdalla da gidan mãsu taƙawa.
arabic: ۞ وَقِيلَ لِلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوۡاْ مَاذَآ أَنزَلَ رَبُّكُمۡۚ قَالُواْ خَيۡرٗاۗ لِّلَّذِينَ أَحۡسَنُواْ فِي هَٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا حَسَنَةٞۚ وَلَدَارُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ خَيۡرٞۚ وَلَنِعۡمَ دَارُ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqīla lilladhīna ittaqaw mādhā anzala rabbukum qālū khayran lilladhīna aḥsanū fī hādhihi al-dun'yā ḥasanatun waladāru al-ākhirati khayrun walaniʿ'ma dāru al-mutaqīna
